item.title: Virtual over ACM
item.description: Reference Deploy Folder: https://github.com/RHsyseng/labs-index/tree/master/deploy-BMHost-virtual-over-acm To have a full reference there’s a deploy script inside the deploy folder mentioned before, with all the steps shown here. Scenario Description The main goal of this document is to explain the deployment of a baremetal host over RHACM. This lab uses sushy tools to emulate the same situation which we could found using a real Baremetal host. Requirements Hub cluster deployed successfully LocalStorage ready Hive operator ready ACM with AI Operator ready Install sushy-tools  Information If you’ve installed IPI baremetal with Kcli and virtual_protocol: Redfish -> you could omit this step because it is already installed.
